page.title: 03EDUCATION IN GLAMIS
page.content:
A playgroup meets twice a week in Charleston Hall for pre-school children. It is run and financed by the members. The numbers vary greatly from year to year, depending on the number of young children.
There is a non-denominational Primary School in Glamis. The roll for a number of years has been in the 50's. There are three class teachers, including the Head Teacher, for the seven classes. There are visiting teachers for Physical Education, Art, Music, and Remedial (mainly language). The Minister of Glamis Kirk is the School Chaplain. He visits school, and end of term religious services are held in the Kirk. The Head Teacher is the only male member of the teaching staff.
